title: Former Vampyre

properties.name: description
properties.value: Former vampyres are humans that were once vampyre juveniles that roamed around Meiyerditch and have been cured of vampyrism through the combined use of a Rod of Ivandis or Ivandis flail's special attack and a dose of Guthix balance. Their pale skin colour may be due to the lack of sunlight they received during their days as a vampyre. They reward the player's kindness by giving them a variety of items.

SMW Subobject for FemaleNPC location: MeiyerditchUses infobox: NPCNPC ID: 3704, 3705, 3706Examine: Has been returned from vampyric form to human.Release date: 4 September 2006Image: File:Former Vampyre (female).pngIs members only: trueIs variant of: Former Vampyre

Former vampyres are humans that were once vampyre juveniles that roamed around Meiyerditch and have been cured of vampyrism through the combined use of a Rod of Ivandis or Ivandis flail's special attack and a dose of Guthix balance. Their pale skin colour may be due to the lack of sunlight they received during their days as a vampyre. They reward the player's kindness by giving them a variety of items.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • Even though they thank the player for curing them, they head north which is where the majority of vampyres live in Meiyerditch.
